post: What's the biggest supermarket/hypermarket in Cologne?

comment.body: Globus in Marsdorf is pretty big.
Globus in Marsdorf, maybe HIT in Braunsfeld?
Metro and Handelshof. Or directly at the Großmarkt, theres a couple of big places (but mainly B2B)
Yep Hauptstr. 128 - 3.850 m² - with over 40.000 products
kaufland in ehrenfeld is also pretty big

Is it the largest supermarket in Cologne? No idea - but definitely the largest Rewe store

[https://www.rewe-istas.de](https://www.rewe-istas.de)
That’s in Erftstadt.. biggest in Cologne is probably some REWE Center or the Selgros (members only) markets
Istas is also in Rodenkirchen. The biggest Rewe in Cologne
Phu - I am not sure, but isn‘t METRO larger than Selgros? Well - maybe not longer since METRO is changing their system … But nevertheless both are members only ….
